titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for quickning the lawes made for the reliefe of the poore, and the suppressing, punishing, and setling of the sturdie rogues, and vagabonds.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: ... Whitehal the three and twentieth day of April, in the sixt yeere of our reigne ...
Arms 22; Steele notation: excel- haue 2) in 3) in 4) shal 5) ignorance or.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
